success.title: Registration confirmed successfully!
success.description: Congratulations! Your registration for {eventName} has been successfully completed. You can now log in and access the participant area.

unknown.title: Error confirming registration
unknown.description: An unknown error occurred while confirming your registration. Please try again later. If the error persists, contact our organization.

invalidToken.title: Error confirming registration
invalidToken.description: Confirm your registration with the link sent to your email.

expiredToken.title: Error confirming registration
expiredToken.description: The confirmation link has expired. Click the button below to request a new confirmation link.
expiredToken.guide: The new link will be sent to the email you provided in the registration form.

enrollmentNotFound.title: Enrollment not found
enrollmentNotFound.description: The enrollment was not found. Please register through the registration form.
enrollmentNotFound.guide: If you have already registered, please contact our organization.

confirmation.title: Confirm your registration
confirmation.description: We sent you an email with a confirmation link. Click the link to finish the registration.

warning.title: Attention:
list: Your registration will only be completed after the email is confirmed.

firstName.minLength: The first name must be at least 1 character long.

lastName.minLength: The last name must be at least 1 character long.

password.minLength: The password must be at least 6 characters long.
password.strong: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one symbol.

confirmPassword.minLength: The password must be at least 6 characters long.

institution.minLength: The institution must be at least 2 characters long.

country.minLength: The country must be at least 2 characters long.

state.minLength: The state must be at least 2 characters long.

city.minLength: The city must be at least 2 characters long.

messages.success: ðŸŽ‰ Registration successful! Check your email for confirmation.
messages.step0Error: Fill in first name, last name, email and password.
